Blog.post: im moving my blog here because everyone telling me to get livejournal http://www.livejournal.com/users/icecaste/

ok homies lets see whats going on...schools over but i have to goto this stupid indian wedding during the weekend....o yah im trying to pull an 18 timer in one day im at 3 so far well see how far i goto today....i got this girls AIM address from school she says she'll play strip chess w/ me SWEET(and i love her shes as werid as me i mean i could be the spokesman for cocopuffs)....thats it for now

well this whole week has been kind of boring im taking exams and stuff.....im know im gona be really freakin bored during the summer because james is going back to the UK but he's gona have his b-day soon thats gona be kind of cool....umm ive started play half-life on hard so when i beat it i can inpress the ladys o ya

well I was so busy talking about my weekend last time that I forgot to say that I got an eyebrow pirecing its cool as hell....well I was gona ask that girl out from the buses today but she wasn't there figures but no matter what next time I see her ill ask her out god damn it I think to much about girls

omg i had to much fun this weekend ok i went to a camping trip w/ most of my closest friends when it was pitch black me,jason,and travis went for a long walk we came across a pay phone and i said "hey we could mess w/ people but we have no money" so travis called freakin 911 i thought i hanged up in time so the call didnt go though but when we walked like 10 feet the pay phone rang i was freaked out but travis answered it as a pizza place and the cop said its cool...later we got to this abandand street and since mark is always thinking hes cool because he took a shit in a public place so i tryed but i couldn't shit so i tryed to piss couldn't do that either but on are way back i pissed on a sign so thats cool...be got back on this beaten road when we were walkin back and this car i though looked like a cop car was stopped at this gate and i was sitting there for like 5 mins i was freaked out agian the car opened the gate and was coming by us we ran but then tryed to act natural and it went past us and i was cool agian......while walking more these kids said for really far away on a field "who are you strangers" and I yelled "none of your ****ing bussiness" and we ran it was fun..we went back to camp and then all my homies went on another walk we got to the beaten path,we saw a huge burst of blue light it was a prefect cirle im very superstitious and i got freaked out like usally do and me and james walked back on are walk back we saw the whole sky light up w/ the blue light (it couldn't have been lighting because we didn't see anymore the rest of the night and I don't think it looked like lightning either)...after everyone got back to camp everyone went back to sleep ex. me,mark s.,and jason we stayed out till 1:30 but james's dad forced us back to sleep...this was the coolest weekend i remember

well my computer is dismantled in my closet right now for a week till i finish painting my computer room so im only gona be able to update my blog from school..................... well its fist period and its boring I might ask that girl out today I wrote hearts on my nipples last night I was REALLY bored

well school sucked today but more then usual I think I need some paxil lol REALLY.....well on the better side of things I think I have the confidence to ask this girl out I like on my bus shes freakin hott but if she says "no" it doesnt really matter anyway my summer will be just like all my other lonely and depressing ones!!!!!!(yea my lifes really this exiting)
Hello im making a blog because im bored this blog is basically for me and my friends but if you dont fit in that catagory whatever
